  1. #-*- coding: utf-8 -*-
  2. #import zipfile
  3. # zipfile.open() is only available in Python 2.6, so we use the future version
  4. from django.core.files.uploadedfile import SimpleUploadedFile
  5. from zipfile import ZipFile
  8. def unzip(file_obj):
  9. """
  10. Take a path to a zipfile and checks if it is a valid zip file
  11. and returns...
  12. """
  13. files = []
  14. # TODO: implement try-except here
  15. zip = ZipFile(file_obj)
  16. bad_file = zip.testzip()
  17. if bad_file:
  18. raise Exception('"%s" in the .zip archive is corrupt.' % bad_file)
  19. infolist = zip.infolist()
  20. for zipinfo in infolist:
  21. if zipinfo.filename.startswith('__'): # do not process meta files
  22. continue
  23. file_obj = SimpleUploadedFile(name=zipinfo.filename, content=zip.read(zipinfo))
  24. files.append((file_obj, zipinfo.filename))
  25. zip.close()
  26. return files
